tool_description: You can use https://ipwhois.io/ to filter out bot traffic, customize content based on visitor's location, display full country names, perform bulk IP geolocation, and more.
title: IP Geolocation - IPWHOIS.io

api_list.name: JSON endpoint
api_list.description: Detailed information on our website: https://ipwhois.io/documentation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-geolocation-ipwhois-io.p.rapidapi.com/json/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-geolocation-ipwhois-io.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: {ip} can be an IPv4 or IPv6 address, or none to use the current IP address.

utterances.utterance: What is the geolocation information for the IP address 192.168.1.1?
Can you provide the geolocation details for the IP address 8.8.8.8?
Find the location of the IP address 2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334.
Where is the IP address 10.0.0.1 located?
Get the geolocation information for the IP address 172.16.254.1.
What country is the IP address 203.0.113.195 from?
Can you tell me the city associated with the IP address 198.51.100.1?
Find the geolocation details for the IP address 192.0.2.1.
What is the location of the IP address 193.0.0.1?
Get the geolocation information for my current IP address.
